description:
Engagement sessions are where the magic starts! This is where we ditch the pressure of the wedding day and just have fun together - wandering through your favorite spots, laughing a ton, and capturing photos that actually feel like you. Whether we’re strolling through the Boston Public Garden, chasing golden hour on Castle Island, or exploring the Esplanade with the skyline behind you, these sessions are all about connection, comfort, and letting your personalities shine.

As a Boston engagement photographer, I’m all about making things easy and laid-back. No stiff posing here—just natural prompts, real laughs, and maybe a few “wow, that’s us?!” moments when you see your gallery. This category is full of real couple stories, outfit inspirations, seasonal tips, and the best engagement photo locations in Boston and beyond.

Whether you're newly engaged, planning a proposal, or just want a casual session to celebrate your relationship, this is the perfect place to get inspired. Let’s create some magic together before the big day even begins.
name: Engagement Sessions
